comment.author: 23836574@N04
comment._content: Is amazing how my country preserves this type of buildings. Now, the Torre de los Ingleses is exactly like it looks in this picture! It is placed in a park near of Retiro, the train station of the city.

comment.author: 15612196@N03
comment._content: My great grandfather, Nicanor Insúa, was a watchmaker who put that clock running. beautiful Photo!
